description: This file contains functions for parsing, forging, comparing, and managing LLDP payloads used in IEEE 1905.1/1a stacks, including handling TLVs and ensuring mandatory TLVs are present.

methods.name: i1905_lldp_payload_t * parse_lldp_PAYLOAD_from_packet(uint8_t * packet_stream)
methods.description: Parses a byte stream packet into an internal LLDP payload structure, extracting TLVs and validating mandatory TLVs.

methods.name: uint8_t * forge_lldp_PAYLOAD_from_structure(i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure,uint16_t * len)
methods.description: Serializes an internal LLDP payload structure into a byte stream suitable for transmission, appending mandatory TLVs and an end-of-LLDPDU TLV.

methods.name: void free_lldp_PAYLOAD_structure(i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for an LLDP payload structure and its TLVs.

methods.name: uint8_t compare_lldp_PAYLOAD_structures(i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure_1,i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure_2)
methods.description: Compares two LLDP payload structures for equality, returning 0 if they are equal.

methods.name: void visit_lldp_PAYLOAD_structure(i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure,void (* callback)(void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix,size_t size,const char * name,const char * fmt,void * p),void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix)
methods.description: Walks through each TLV in the payload structure and invokes a callback for presentation or processing.

ctags.name: visit_lldp_PAYLOAD_structure
ctags.signature: (i1905_lldp_payload_t * memory_structure,void (* callback)(void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix,size_t size,const char * name,const char * fmt,void * p),void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix)
